name: Auto-generated request ID (UUID v4)
description: Tests automatic UUID v4 request ID generation and propagation to response headers

source.test_case: Auto-generate UUID v4 request ID when not provided by client

X-Request-ID.description: UUID v4 format (lowercase hexadecimal with version 4 and variant bits)

notes: When no X-Request-ID is provided by client, server auto-generates a UUID v4 and includes it in response headers
